amendment.description: Amendment offered in the nature of a substitute.
amendment.purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 1449, the Amendment in the Nature of a Substitute printed in House Report 110-859 is adopted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
